thesis.title: Algorithms in computer algebra
thesis.description: Implement fundamental algorithms in Computer Algebra (polynomial GCD, polynomial factorization)

thesis.title: Componente pentru un Cloud descentralizat
thesis.description: Crearea unor componente ale unui sistem distribuit, descentralizat, care monitorizează și aplică politici pentru servicii Cloud care rulează pe calculatoare personale participante în rețea.  Implementare: algoritmi distribuiți, blockchain, criptografie, trusted execution environments

thesis.title: Aplicatii ale sistemelor inteligente – Analiza evolutiei pietelor de capital/ Analiza evolutiei Bitcoin
thesis.description: Aplicatii ale sistemelor inteligente – Analiza evolutiei pietelor de capital/ Analiza evolutiei Bitcoin

thesis.title: Infrastructure as a Code for Cloud-to-Edge continuum
thesis.description: IaC for Cloud environments is based on templates for resources and services (like TOSCA). Extending this approach to heterogeneous resources like the devices at the edge of the network is a challenge. Proposal for such extensions and experiments are expected.

thesis.title: Adaptive framework for parallel computations on heterogeneous platforms
thesis.description: OpenCL allows the worksloads to be shared by CPU and GPUs in executing the same code. Optimizing the partitioning between the heterogeneous devices involves heuristics. Experiments are expected, eg using machine learning, to solve the partitioning problems for concrete problems to be solved.
